summary.span: 创建和管理客户端用来将消息发送到服务终结点的通道。

span.span: Creates and manages the channels that are used by clients to send messages to service endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 接口的通道工厂及其关联通道一般由通信模式的发起方使用。Channel factories that implement the interface and their associated channels are generally used by the initiators of a communication pattern. 而实现 接口的侦听器工厂及其关联侦听器则提供一些用于接受通道以进行通信的机制。Listener factories that implement the interface and their associated listeners provide the mechanisms with which channels are accepted for communications. 此类不属于通道模型，而属于服务模型。This class is not part of the channel model, but of the service model. 方法提供为服务终结点创建 的方式。The method provides the means to create an for a service endpoint. 使用该方法可以构建与服务上接口协定关联的客户端，而无需使用元数据或策略。Use it to construct a client that hooks up to an interface contract on the service without using metadata or policy. > [!NOTE] > 将 `ChannelFactory.Credentials.Windows.AllowedImpersonationLevel` 设置为 `TokenImpersonationLevel.Anonymous` 总是会导致匿名登录，而不论模拟级别为何。Setting `ChannelFactory.Credentials.Windows.AllowedImpersonationLevel` to `TokenImpersonationLevel.Anonymous` always results in an anonymous logon regardless of impersonation level. 针对从此类派生的托管 C++ 用户的特别说明：Special note for Managed C++ users deriving from this class: - 将清理代码放入 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）中，而不是放入析构函数中。Put your cleanup code in (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort), not in a destructor. - 避免使用析构函数；它们会导致编译器自动生成 。Avoid destructors; they cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用非引用成员；它们可能会导致编译器自动生成 。Avoid non-reference members; they can cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用终结器；但如果包含一个终结器，则应该禁止显示生成警告并从 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）调用 和终结器本身，以便模拟已自动生成的 行为。Avoid using a finalizer; but if you include one, you should suppress the build warning and call and the finalizer itself from (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) to emulate what would have been the auto-generated behavior. 以编程方式添加行为时，可以在创建任何通道之前将行为添加到 `Behaviors` 上相应的 属性。When adding behaviors programmatically, the behavior is added to the appropriate `Behaviors` property on the prior to the creation of any channel. 有关代码示例，请参见“示例”部分。See the example section for a code sample. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在工厂创建通道对象前，以编程方式插入客户端行为。The following code example shows how to insert programmatically a client behavior prior to the creation of the channel object by the factory. [!code-csharp[ChannelFactoryBehaviors#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/channelfactorybehaviors/cs/client.cs#10)] [!code-vb[ChannelFactoryBehaviors#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/channelfactorybehaviors/vb/client.vb#10)]

span.span: The name of the configuration file.

summary.span: 使用由指定配置文件提供的行为和通道工厂服务终结点中的那些行为来初始化通道工厂。

span.span: Initializes the channel factory with the behaviors provided by a specified configuration file and with those in the service endpoint of the channel factory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `configurationName` 为 `null`，则仅加载服务终结点中指定的行为。If `configurationName` is `null`, only the behaviors specified in the service endpoint are loaded. 如果使用通配符“\*”，则会使用客户端配置文件中的任何终结点配置，但前提是正好有一个终结点配置。If the wildcard, "\*", is used, any endpoint configuration in the client configuration file is used, but only if there is precisely one. 否则会引发异常。Otherwise an exception is thrown. `configurationName` 的任何其他值（包括空字符串“”）都与同名的终结点配置匹配。Any other value for the `configurationName`, including the empty string "", matches the endpoint configuration with the same name. 请参阅[WCF 客户端配置](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/client-configuration.md)有关客户端配置的讨论主题。See the [WCF Client Configuration](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/client-configuration.md) topic for a discussion of the client configuration.

exception.span: 通道工厂的服务终结点为 。

span.span: The service endpoint of the channel factory is .

summary.span: 为工厂的当前终结点生成通道工厂。

span.span: Builds the channel factory for the current endpoint of the factory.
An for the endpoint of the current factory.

exception.span: 工厂通道所连接的服务终结点为 ，或者终结点的绑定为 或是缺少具有指定配置名称的元素。

span.span: The endpoint of the service that the factory channels connect to is or the endpoint's binding is or is missing the element with the configuration name specified.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Credentials As ClientCredentials

summary.span: 获取客户端在通过由工厂产生的通道与服务终结点进行通信时使用的凭据。

span.span: Gets the credentials used by clients to communicate a service endpoint over the channels produced by the factory.

value.span: 如果已为工厂配置凭据或终结点不为 且处于已创建或正在打开通信状态，则为客户端使用的 ；否则为 。

span.span: The used by clients if they are configured for the factory or if the endpoint is non- and is in either the created or opening communication state; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象会以一种终结点行为的形式存储，可通过 属性进行访问。The object is stored as a type of endpoint behavior and can be accessed through the property. 方法会为工厂初始化 对象的一个只读副本。The method initializes a read-only copy of the object for the factory. 类（或从此类派生的类）会使用 对象来创建可调用服务的代理对象。The object is used by the class (or a class that derives from this class) to create the proxy objects that can call services. 也可以通过 属性来访问 对象。The object is also accessible through the property. > [!NOTE] > 将 `ChannelFactory.Credentials.Windows.AllowedImpersonationLevel` 设置为 `TokenImpersonationLevel.Anonymous` 总是会导致匿名登录，而不论模拟级别为何。Setting `ChannelFactory.Credentials.Windows.AllowedImpersonationLevel` to `TokenImpersonationLevel.Anonymous` always results in an anonymous logon regardless of impersonation level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 和 均为 `null`，则获取默认服务模型关闭超时。Gets the default service model close time-out if both the and are `null`. 服务模型关闭超时的默认值是 1 分钟。The default value for the service model close time-out is 1 minute. 否则，该值将设置为与 关联的 值。Otherwise, the value is set to the value associated with the .

MemberSignature.Value: public T GetProperty<T> () where T : class;
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !!T GetProperty<class T>() cil managed
Public Function GetProperty(Of T As Class) () As T
abstract member GetProperty : unit -> 'T (requires 'T : null) override this.GetProperty : unit -> 'T (requires 'T : null)

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 方法正在查询的类型化对象。

span.span: The typed object for which the method is querying.

summary.span: 从通道堆栈的适当层返回所请求的类型化对象，如果不存在，则返回 。

span.span: Returns the typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the channel stack, or if not present.

returns.span: 如果存在，则为所请求的类型化对象 ，如果不存在，则为 。

span.span: The typed object requested if it is present or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以从通道堆栈中检索功能、需求和参数。Use this to retrieve capabilities, requirements and parameters from the channel stack. 如果通道工厂支持返回所请求的对象，则会返回对象。If a channel factory supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不支持，则该层会将调用委托给堆栈中的下一级别。If not, it delegates the call down to the next level in the stack. 如果到达堆栈底部仍然没有通道工厂支持所请求的对象，则该方法将返回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no channel factory supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`. `T` 通常是通道工厂可支持的某种通道接口。`T` is typically some channel interface that the channel factory can support. 例如，如果对双工通道工厂调用 `GetProperty`，则会返回基础侦听器。If, for example, `GetProperty` is called on a duplex channel factory, it returns the underlying listener.

summary.span: 初始化通道工厂的服务终结点。

span.span: Initializes the service endpoint of the channel factory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要初始化终结点，必须有一个地址，但是可以只有绑定或配置，而非完整终结点。You must have an address to initialize an endpoint, but can have just the binding or configuration instead of the full endpoint.

summary.span: 终止当前通道工厂的内部通道工厂。

span.span: Terminates the inner channel factory of the current channel factory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用了 方法，则会在工厂转换到正在关闭状态后，对其调用 方法。The method is called on a factory after it transitions to the closing state if the method is invoked.

summary.span: 对当前通道工厂（具有关联的状态对象）的内部通道工厂，开始一个异步关闭操作。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous close operation on the inner channel factory of the current channel factory that has a state object associated with it.
The that references the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通过回调为操作接收事件处理程序标识的通知。This method receives notification, through a callback, of the identity of the event handler for the operation. 直到内部通道工厂的异步关闭操作返回或发生超时的时候，才会完成操作。The operation is not complete until either the asynchronous close on the inner channel factory returns or the time-out occurs.
